snippet: At least 15 were killed in an ambush, a military official said, and the Shabab rebel group claimed responsibility on its online radio station.
abstract: Shabab rebel group follows up deadly attack in Somali capital of Mogadishu with ambush near Walaweyn, killing at least 15 government soldiers.
lead_paragraph: At least 15 were killed in an ambush, a military official said, and the Shabab rebel group claimed responsibility on its online radio station.

headline.main: Somalia: Soldiers Killed in Rebel Attack
headline.print_headline: Africa; Somalia: Soldiers Killed in Rebel Attack
